CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1964, pg. 19 reads: "Rodman's Queen, Court - Mrs. Mabel Buford (center front), donned in regal splendor, was crowned queen of the State Pew Rally, last Sunday afternoon, at Rodman Street Baptist Church, for having reported the top amount, $292.50. Mrs. Clara Conover (left), first runner-up, reported $254.  The third-place winner (right) brought in $135.  Other participants include Mmes. Janet Robertson, Anna Glover, Rose Posie, Magnolia Riggins, Lucy King, Mary Phillips, Barbara Bush, Amy Vasser, Lilliard Chapman, Clara Warkins, Lucille Jackson, Carolyn Diggs, Mary E. Nelson, Billie Smith, Jackie Page, Ruth Watkins and Pearl Holland. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Queen" Mabel Buford, center, seated between Clara Conover and unknown woman, with participants including; Janet Robertson, Anna Glover, Rose Posie, Magnolia Riggins, Lucy King, Mary Phillips, Barbara Bush, Amy Vasser, Lilliard Chapman, Clara Warkins, Lucille Jackson, Carolyn Diggs, Mary E. Nelson, Billie Smith, Jackie Page, Ruth Watkins, and Pearl Holland, posed in front of altar in Rodman Street Baptist Church during State Pew Rally
